DOC.brief_title: Effect Iron Vitamin E Supplementation Disease Activity Patients With Either Crohn 's Disease Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.detailed_description: To maintain site/extent disease medication consistent among group , design double blind crossover placebo-controlled trial . 1 . If mild anaemia , patient randomize 300 mg ferrous fumarate placebo 4 week follow 2 week washout period patient crossover opposite treatment another 4 week . 2 . If moderate anaemia , patient receive 600 mg ferrous fumarate 10 week . They randomize either vitamin E ( 800 IU ) placebo 4 week follow 2 week washout period patient crossover opposite treatment another 4 week
